alert.note: Alert for Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:24PM CDT until August 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Western Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 724 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Colby to 3 miles north of Monument, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oakley, Gem, Grinnell, Rexford and Selden. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 52 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
